about_the_game:
Transform the look of your favourite animals in Meadow! This pack contains two new skins: one Zebra skin for the Goat and one Hyena skin for the Wolf.

Zebras. Are they white with black stripes, or black with white stripes? This question keeps the entire scientific community up at night. We do know that their individual stripe patterns are unique to them, like our fingerprints are to us. A sad Zebra fact for you: they don’t sound anything like Chris Rock.

Hyenas are most known for their laugh like cackling, but not all species of hyena do them and it has nothing to do with their sense of humour. The “laugh” is an indication of nervous excitement or a sign of submission to a more dominant individual. If you want to learn something really freaky about hyenas you can look up their process of giving birth. We’re not going to go into detail here.
